attributes.action: Get rail, bus and other transport workers the Covid vaccine next !
attributes.additional_details:
The government really need to change their priority list for the Covid vaccine, rail, bus and other transport workers are constantly on the frontline and potentially spreading and being infected by Covid. 

They are ensuring commuters of other essential work,  get to work and are putting their lives at risk.

We cannot work from home.
attributes.background: I want the government to give priority to all rail, bus and other transport workers who work on the frontline. We have worked on the frontline putting our lives at risk to ensure other essential workers can get to work.
